name: ChopX - Chop It Up Game
description:
You can become a woodcutter and chop the wood or a builder and smash the rock, or even better go on a beach and crush the fruits. Choose the scene as per your mood.
To make the game even more fun for you, there are bonus items such as stars, hearts, and time clocks. You have to collect as many bonuses as you can. Hearts count as extra lives that allow you to continue the game after it is over. Chop the clock to slow down the game speed likewise stars help you get to the next levels.

Highlights of ChopX: Chop it Up!
• Simple, easy and fun game
• Free to download and free to play
• Visual and high-quality graphics
• Free and offline, no internet required
• The smooth and effortless gameplay experience

Game Instructions
• Do not tap on the bombs and explosives
• Slow down the game by tapping on the clock
• Collect hearts to gain extra lives
• Collect stars to unlock next levels

In addition to bonus items, you must also be careful. One tap on the bomb and the game is finished. To continue even after the game is over, collect extra lives.

Thank you for downloading ChopX, Enjoy playing!
